diagnostic_method: ['bronchoscopy with bronchioalveolar lavage (BAL) with transbronchial cryo biopsy']
diagnostic_method_quote: The patient eventually underwent bronchoscopy with bronchioalveolar lavage (BAL) with transbronchial cryobiopsy of lung nodules
imaging_findings: ['numerous sub 6 mm bilateral centrilobular GGNs and solid pulmonary nodules with mild upper lobe predominance']
imaging_findings_quote: CT scan chest 1 year later showed numerous sub 6 mm bilateral centrilobular GGNs and solid pulmonary nodules with mild upper lobe predominance
histopathology_quote: BAL with transbronchial cryobiopsy of lung nodules showed MPMNs
treatment_quote: a decision was made for close follow-up with serial CT scans
outcome_quote: given the complexity of the case, lack of symptoms, and stability of nodules
comorbidities: ['ductal hyperplasia of the breast', 'common variable immunode /uniFB01 ciency syndrome (CVID)', 'asthma', 'obstructive sleep apnea', 'thyroid follicular cancer']
filename: Virk et al. - 2023 - RIDDLE ME THIS A RARE CASE OF DIFFUSE PULMONARY MENINGIOTHELIOMAS.pdf

diagnostic_method: ['Heterotopic heart transplantation', 'Anastomosis of the donor pulmonary artery to the recipient right atrium']
diagnostic_method_quote: From the given criteria (Table 1) Heterotopic heart transplantation (HHT), with anastomosis of the donor pulmonary artery to the recipient right atrium.
treatment_quote: Heterotopic heart transplantation (HHT), with anastomosis of the donor pulmonary artery to the recipient right atrium.
comorbidities: ['restrictive cardiomyopathy', 'idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy', 'ischemic cardiomyopathy', 'anthracycline chemotherapy', 'severe left ventricular dysfunction after resection of a sub-aortic membrane', 'corrected transposition of great arteries with right isomerism', 'ventricular septal defect']
filename: Luvison et al. - 2013 - Pulmonary meningothelial-like nodules are of donor origin in lung allografts.pdf
extraction_notes: Data from two different studies are provided here. Only the relevant data from the second study ('Heterotopic heart transplantation for elevated pulmonary vascular resistance in the current era: Long-term clinical and hemodynamic outcomes') is extracted.
